text: The Floating Island is a fantasy novel by American writer Elizabeth Haydon. Released in 2006, the book is the first installment in The Lost Journals of Ven Polypheme series. ==External links== *Ven Polypheme Curriculum Site *Fantastic fiction Category:2006 novels Category:2006 fantasy novels Category:Novels set on islands
title: The Floating Island (Haydon novel)
